rule.name: OM_ER_Column_GENERATE
rule.definition: with( #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridRowLayout"( id: ri!indexVal, contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Name " & ri!indexVal , value: index(ri!employee[ri!indexVal], "EmpName" ,{}), saveInto: {a!save( ri!employee[ri!indexVal].EmpName , save!value)}, required: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField"( label: "Designation " & ri!indexVal, placeholderLabel: "--Select Profile--", choiceLabels: { "Human Resource", "Development", "QA", "BA", "DBA", "Network Admin", "Fresher", "Staff" }, choiceValues: { "Human Resource", "Development", "QA", "BA", "DBA", "Network Admin", "Fresher", "Staff" }, value: index( ri!employee[ri!indexVal], "EmpDesignation", {} ), saveInto: { a!save( ri!employee[ri!indexVal].EmpDesignation, save!value ) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"( label: "Age " & ri!indexVal , value: index(ri!employee[ri!indexVal], "EmpAge" ,{}), saveInto: {a!save( ri!employee[ri!indexVal].EmpAge , save!value)}, required: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"( label: "Salary " & ri!indexVal , value: index(ri!employee[ri!indexVal], "EmpSalary" ,{}), saveInto: {a!save( ri!employee[ri!indexVal].EmpSalary , save!value)}, required: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_imageField_v1"( label: "delete " & ri!indexVal, size: "ICON", images: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"( document: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_iconIndicator"( "REMOVE" ), altText: "Remove Employee", caption: "Remove " & ri!employee[ri!indexVal].EmpName, link:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"( value: ri!indexVal, saveInto:{ a!save(ri!employee , remove(ri!employee , save!value)) } ) ) ) } ) )
